page.title: 20BIBURY IS...a child's view
page.content: Bibury is a small village in the Cotswolds. Bibury is "the most beautiful village in England." Bibury is the Mill Museum, Arlington Row, and the Trout Farm. Bibury is feeding the ducks and swans by the River Coln. Bibury is traffic and tourists. Bibury is wandering up Awkward Hill and along Packhorse Lane. Bibury is the village cricket match. Bibury is the view from Ladyhill. Bibury is an old church and a small village school. Bibury is full of friendly people. Bibury is where we and our families live. Bibury is our home. We like Bibury.
